backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing rooms, devices, sensors, user profiles, support tickets, and user auto-provisioning with access control and room pagination helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to frontend user auto-provisioning integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global OKLCH theme variables and dark-mode definitions with shared background, border, and typography styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that pre-enables dark mode and loads the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that gates access via SecurityGateway, triggers auto-provisioning, manages navigation, and handles 3D view transitions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LiveSt: Dashboard stats section computing real-time device metrics and rendering energy, health, and activity charts with loading fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/widget: SVG pie chart component that computes slice geometry from device state and renders a donut-style activity chart with legend and empty state.
Renders an SVG line chart with gradient fill and data points for energy consumption over time using calculated path data.
Displays a circular gauge that visualizes a 0–100 health value with dynamic color and animated stroke offset.
frontend/src/components/effects/GlassCar: Wraps content in a styled glass-like card with optional 3D tilt interaction.
frontend/src/components/effects/Tilt.tsx: Applies a mouse‑responsive 3D tilt effect to wrapped content unless reduced‑motion is preferred.
Provides the main application layout with a sidebar, header, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Renders a branded header bar with gradient title text.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Displays a sidebar with navigation items, a configurable quick action button, and a footer section.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateDevi: Modal form for creating a new device with validation, power and brightness controls, and automatic ID assignment.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateRoom: Modal form for adding a room with validation, color selection, and automatic ID allocation within a 0–99 limit.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDashbo: A full room control dashboard that fetches devices and sensor stats, provides toggles and brightness controls, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDevice: A lightweight room preview card showing room metadata and actions, used to open a detailed dashboard without loading device data.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomSettin: Dialog for editing a room’s name, color, and visibility with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsListS: Skeleton UI component that mimics the rooms list layout during loading.
frontend/src/components/security/QRScann: Dialog providing QR code scanning with camera handling, auto-start, error states, and success callbacks.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Bas: Simple wrapper component rendering the realistic 3D home model.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/con: Full-screen touch area enabling drag-based camera rotation on mobile while avoiding the joystick zone.
Hook handling pointer-lock mouse look, updating camera rotation when enabled.
Touch-based camera rotation for mobile, tracking drag gestures with clamped pitch.
Tracks WASD key presses to output movement direction state.
On-screen joystick for movement with deadzone smoothing, touch/desktop support, and automatic reset when disabled.
Unified navigation logic combining WASD, mouse/touch look, joystick input, teleportation, and room-based movement bounds.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/dev: Defines and queries 3D positions for named light devices and filters devices with mapped positions.
UI dialog for toggling a light device and adjusting brightness with mutations.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/hot: Interactive 3D hotspot orb with hover effects, floating animation, and click handling.
Renders hotspots for devices with mapped positions and triggers device selection.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/lig: Draws 3D light fixtures at device positions with emissive brightness based on device state.
Configures ambient, directional, fill, and device-driven lighting for the 3D scene.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/map: Static 2D floorplan regions defining clickable room areas and zoom transforms.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Rea: Extensive Three.js scene rendering a detailed 3D home interior with walls, floor, furniture, and materials.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/roo: Navigation bounds per room restricting valid camera movement ranges.
Predefined camera spawn positions and orientations for each room.
Maps canvas clicks to room IDs based on camera position unless disabled.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Roo: Dialog listing rooms and allowing users to select one for teleportation in 3D mode.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Sma: Sidebar for room-level device control that fetches device/switch state and provides master ON/OFF actions with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Vir: Interactive 2D floorplan with zoomable room regions, reduced-motion support, and room selection handling.
Error boundary that reports 3D scene rendering errors and suppresses broken content.
UI toggle for switching between 2D map and 3D walkthrough modes.
Main 3D scene combining lighting, interior, device hotspots, navigation, and room surface picking with device dialog management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
Automatically provisions authenticated users by calling actor.initializeAccess once per session using a React Query mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomSidebarActio: Manages a user‑configurable sidebar action stored in localStorage with reactive updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login, and exposing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting via a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, rooms, and related backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecurityGateway.ts: Implements a security gateway storing a secret key and unlock state with validation and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebGLSupport.ts: Checks whether WebGL is supported by attempting to create a rendering context and reports errors.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base styles and theme variables with light/dark palettes and custom glass/3D UI components.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper combining clsx and tailwind‑merge for class merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React, providing QueryClient and Internet Identity context, and loading global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with device and room statistics, loading states, and a button to open the 3D view.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Manages room listing, filtering, provisioning flow, and displays room details or sidebar views with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityGatewayPage.t: Provides a secure unlock screen where users enter or scan a secret key to access the app, with validation and error display.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays app settings including appearance, security key visibility, and configuration of a customizable sidebar action.
frontend/src/pages/SupportInfoPage.tsx: Shows a searchable knowledge base and a support ticket form with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualHome3DPage.tsx: Main full-screen virtual home page managing 2D/3D modes, room selection, WebGL readiness, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides a helper that wraps a promise and rejects if it does not resolve within a specified timeout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, shadows, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing auto-provisioning requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests.
